content: And I think if you look at the Canadian landscape, today, going back over five years, you'll see that there's been a tremendous difficulty in many companies who are new to -- not just new to the agricultural industry, but have brand new assets, it takes a tremendous amount of effort to get to a point of operational excellence, where you're generating profitable outcomes in training your people and ramping them up the attrition rate, understanding the tool, understanding the climate.
